member.name: IMFMediaTimeRange.AddRange
member.summary: Adds a new range to the list of time ranges.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaTimeRange.Clear
member.summary: Clears the list of time ranges.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaTimeRange.ContainsTime
member.summary: Queries whether a specified time falls within any of the time ranges.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if any time range contained in this object spans the value of the time parameter. Otherwise, returns FALSE.

member.name: IMFMediaTimeRange.GetEnd
member.summary: Gets the end time for a specified time range.
member.param: The zero-based index of the time range to query. To get the number of time ranges, call .
Receives the end time, in seconds.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaTimeRange.GetLength
member.summary: Gets the number of time ranges contained in the object.
member.returns: Returns the number of time ranges.

member.name: IMFMediaTimeRange.GetStart
member.summary: Gets the start time for a specified time range.
member.param: The zero-based index of the time range to query. To get the number of time ranges, call .
Receives the start time, in seconds.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaTimeRange
member.summary: Represents a list of time ranges, where each range is defined by a start and end time.
